0.1.name: wordpress/wp-universal-exchange-informer
0.1.description:
Exchange rate informer for Wordpress. This plugin allow to get exchange rates from banks supported by plugin, and show their like widget in your blog.

Supported banks: The Central Bank of the Russian Federation, National bank of Ukraine, National Bank of Moldova.
